title.rendered: STEDI 10W MINI LED FLUSH MOUNT OSRAM

content.rendered:
Our ST1012-10W is one of the most versatile lights in our range and a popular favorite with our customers. This is what brought us to introduce a flush mounted version which brings all the same application use as the 10w mini but in a cleaner finish flush mount.

OUR BEST SELLING LED WORK LIGHT

NOW IN A FLUSH MOUNT

FACTORY FINISH

Our popular 10W Mini LED Work Lights have received a new addition to the family now available in a flush mount for a clean install when using as a reverse light to provide a powerful light with an oem finish.

LOW POWER, HIGH BRIGHTNESS. 

Running 2x 5w Osram LEDs supplies more light than you would expect from a 300g light. With a 40 degree flood and low current draw of 0.5a @ 13.8v it really is no surprise they are our best selling LED Work Light.

APPLICATION

The 10w Minis have an almost endless list of application and can be used from work/camping lights to bumper mounted reverse lights.

DETAILS

KEY FEATURES

  • Flood Optics for a wide 40 degree spread pattern
  • 12 Volt and 24v Compatible
  • Waterproof Male & Female Deutsch connectors included
  • Stainless Steel Fittings
  • IP67 – Protected against immersion up to 1m in depth for no longer than 30 minutes at a time
  • OSRAM GmbH Emitters

SPECIFICATIONS

LED POWER 10 WATTS
OPERATING VOLTAGE 12v & 24v Compatible
LED CHIPS 5W x 2 Osram LED’s
COLOUR TEMPERATURE 5700K
RAW LUMENS 1,000Lm
CURRENT DRAW 0.5A @ 13.8V
BEAM Flood Beam
WATERPROOF IP67
DUSTPROOF & ANTI-VIBRATION YES
LENS Optical PC
MOUNTING BRACKET STAINLESS STEEL
HOUSING MATERIAL Cast Aluminum Housing
LIFE SPAN 50000+ HOURS
DIMENSIONS (W) 77mm x (H) 48mm (D)55mm
CERTIFICATES CE, RoHs & ECE
WEIGHT 0.3kg

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x 10W Mini LED Flush Mount
  • 2 x M6 Bolts
  • 2 x Nylock Nut
  • 2 x Flat Washer
  • Allen Wrench
  • Male & Female Deutsch Connectors

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI 10W MINI LED FLUSH MOUNT OSRAM

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
